#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long int
int main()
{
    stack<int> s;
    long long int x,num;
    while(1)
    {
        cin>>x;
        if(x==-1)
        {
            break;
        }
        else
        {
            num=x;
            while(num)
            {
                s.push(num%7);
                num=num/7;
            }
            while(!s.empty())
            {
                cout<<s.top();
                s.pop();
            }
            cout<<"\n";
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
